title: Vibrating Champion
body: When I first start the game, my champion vibrates as they run to lane and it's really annoying.

replies.body:
When you see your champion 'vibrating', have you noticed any spikes in your FPS or ping?

If your FPS is really low, it would cause this vibration if your screen isn't able to keep up with what's really happening on the servers. For example, your champion is stuttering because the images aren't being blended together well enough to look smooth. Check out our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) and let me know if that helps.
I've never noticed reduced FPS or ping but I will keep a look out for that. Thanks for the response.
